Description: Wall sherd of East Greek (South Ionian?) pottery cup; light red-brown clay with much silver mica; interior glazed red; exterior: broad band near top of wall, reserved either side; inscription cut immediately above band.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), temenos (said to be)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.848)
